com.xtructure.xsim.impl
Class AbstractStandardXComponent

java.lang.Object
  com.xtructure.xutil.id.AbstractXIdObject
      com.xtructure.xsim.impl.AbstractStandardXComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
XComponent<StandardXClock.StandardTimePhase>, XIdObject, java.lang.Comparable<XIdObject>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractNetwork, AbstractSimpleStandardXComponent, AbstractStandardXReporter, AbstractStandardXTerminator, AbstractStandardXVisualization, LinkTracer, LinkTracer, NodeTracer, NodeTracer, OnedWorldImpl
public abstract class AbstractStandardXComponent
extends AbstractXIdObject
implements XComponent<StandardXClock.StandardTimePhase>

A base class for components that use a StandardXClock.

Version:
0.9.6
Author:
Peter Nürnberg, Luis Guimbarda

prepareBeforeHook

protected void prepareBeforeHook()
A pre-processing hook for prepare().

By default, does nothing, but may be overriden by specializations of AbstractStandardXComponent.

prepare

protected void prepare()
A processing hook for update(XTime) in the StandardXClock.StandardTimePhase.PREPARE phase.

By default, gets all foreign data, but may be overriden by specializations of AbstractStandardXComponent.

prepareAfterHook

protected void prepareAfterHook()
A post-processing hook for prepare().

By default, does nothing, but may be overriden by specializations of AbstractStandardXComponent.

addForeignData

protected abstract void addForeignData(XId targetId,
                                       XAddress sourceAddress,
                                       java.lang.Object data)
Adds the given data from the identified source to the identified target.

Parameters:
targetId - the id of the target to which this data should be added
sourceAddress - the address from which the given data originated
